definition: to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: For example, the cost of a one-year insurance policy paid in advance is a prepaid expense.
sentences.chinese: 今後要支付的一年期保險單就是一種預提費用。
你會調整你的預提稅額嗎？

sentences.english: For example, the cost of a one-year i urance policy paid in advance is a prepaid expe e.
sentences.chinese: 今後要支付的一年期保險單就是一種預提費用。

sentences.english: Prepaid expenses are listed last among the current assets.
sentences.chinese: 預提費用被列示在流動資產的最後一項。

sentences.english: Could you let me have the Bonus provision by Monday before noon.
sentences.chinese: 請您在禮拜一中午前把獎金預提提供給我。
